sentences.en: All flights to Lanchow had been cancelled until further notice.
sentences.cn: 所有飞往兰州的航班都已取消，何时恢复另行通知。

sentences.en: Blend the butter with the sugar and beat until light and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把糖掺入黄油然后搅拌至滑软细腻。

sentences.en: Both were remanded on bail by Wrexham magistrates until March 24.
sentences.cn: 两个人都被雷克瑟姆的地方治安官批准保释，直到3月24日审判。

sentences.en: Britain did not introduce compulsory primary education until 1880.
sentences.cn: 直到1880年，英国才开始实行初等义务教育。

sentences.en: Cook the sauce over a low heat until it boils and thickens.
sentences.cn: 以小火加热酱汁至其沸腾变浓。

sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentences.en: He then held the man in an armlock until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 然后他反扭住那名男子的手臂让他动弹不得，直到警察赶到。

sentences.en: He waited until all the luggage was cleared, but Paula's never appeared.
sentences.cn: 他一直等到所有的行李都拿走了，但始终没看见葆拉的。

sentences.en: He waited until she had finished speaking.
His course at Sheffield University will not recommence until next year.
sentences.cn: 他在谢菲尔德大学的课程要到明年才能继续。

sentences.en: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentences.cn: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

sentences.en: Ness chased the thief down and held him until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 内斯追上小偷，按住他，一直等到警察赶到。

sentences.en: Place the omelette under a gentle grill until the top is set.
sentences.cn: 将煎蛋饼放在烤架下用文火烘烤，直到表面凝固。

sentences.en: Put the onions in the pan and cook until lightly browned.
sentences.cn: 将洋葱放入平底锅内，炒至略呈棕色。

sentences.en: Stir the pork about until it turns white all the way through.
sentences.cn: 不停搅动猪肉，直到它全部变白为止。

sentences.en: The ticket is valid until March.
sentences.cn: 这张票的有效期一直到 3 月份。

sentences.en: Until recently, Anna worked as a teacher in Japan.
sentences.cn: 直到最近，安娜一直在日本当老师。

sentences.en: Up until last year, they didn’t even own a car.
sentences.cn: 一直到去年，他们连汽车也没有。

sentences.en: Whisk the egg whites until they are foamy but not stiff.
sentences.cn: 把蛋清搅至起沫而不黏稠的程度。

trans.tran_en: if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time
if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time

trans.tran_cn: 直到…时， 到…为止； 直到…
trans.tran_en: if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time
